name: Mitigation Playbook for Unauthorized PowerShell Commands Incident
description: This playbook manages an incident where an attacker executed unauthorized PowerShell commands to exfiltrate sensitive data from a compromised user account.

parallel--0f8e0267-b9a8-4f7d-bb48-aecf12.name: Parallel Mitigation Actions
parallel--0f8e0267-b9a8-4f7d-bb48-aecf12.description: Execute kill process and isolate host simultaneously.

action--5e0c8a61-84e0-4fbc-9199-a692c28b.name: Kill malicious PowerShell process
action--5e0c8a61-84e0-4fbc-9199-a692c28b.description: Terminate any running PowerShell commands that may have been executed by the attacker.

action--f9f26d96-bcd0-4821-a66d-b0292c4d.name: Isolate compromised host
action--f9f26d96-bcd0-4821-a66d-b0292c4d.description: Take the compromised host offline to prevent further data exfiltration.

commands.command: if [ $(hostname) = 'host-22' ]; then ifconfig eth0 down; fi

loop--f1d2f76e-c5d7-4a4e-83c1-7e9e65ef29.name: Monitor outbound network traffic
loop--f1d2f76e-c5d7-4a4e-83c1-7e9e65ef29.description: Continually monitor the network for any suspicious traffic.

action--2ff0381d-6f8b-40ef-8439-fb74b43a.name: Capture suspicious traffic
action--2ff0381d-6f8b-40ef-8439-fb74b43a.description: Start a tcpdump session to capture outbound packets to a suspicious IP.
